meanings.definition: A chemical compound formed by the reaction of ethylene oxide with an alcohol or phenol.
meanings.sent1: The ethoxyls were used in the production of detergents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of ethoxyls in laboratories.
meanings.sent3: The ethoxyls decided to throw a party in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a bottle of ethoxyls, mixing different ideas together.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the ethoxyls made them stand out in the solution.

meanings.sent1: The company ethoxyls the fabrics to make them softer.
meanings.sent2: She carefully ethoxyls the plants to protect them from pests.
meanings.sent3: The chef ethoxyls the vegetables with a special sauce.
meanings.sent4: His words ethoxyls her heart, making her feel loved.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic ethoxyls the engine, ensuring it runs smoothly.
